| History                 = The armed forces of [[Rotruvia]] fought the [[Latverian Army (Earth-616)|army]] of neighboring country [[Latveria]] when its ruler [[Victor von Doom (Earth-616)|Doctor Doom]] launched an attack to annex Rotruvia to his kingdom.

The [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]] assisted the Rotruvian army after many of their men had been killed in action, and defeated Doctor Doom. Unfortunately, a failsafe measure from Doom's plan caused every trace of [[Molynite]], a precious Rotruvian element, to be destroyed, jeopardizing Rotruvia's economy and forcing its government to accept Doom's terms of surrender, which resulted in the objective of the Latverian dictator being achieved.{{r|All-New, All-Different Avengers #15}}
